story.title: BC-US--House Fire-Tennessee,CLARIFICATION
story.summary: NASHVILLE, Tenn. (AP) — In a story Feb. 14 and 15 about a fatal fire in a Tennessee group home, The Associated Press reported that the facility was operated by a Tennessee group called Footprints to Recovery. The story should have made clear that...

xmlText.p: Eds: Editors who used BC-US--House Fire-Tennessee of Feb. 14 and 15 may wish to use the following, which explains the operator of the house is not related to a group with a similar name based elsewhere.

NASHVILLE, Tenn. (AP) — In a story Feb. 14 and 15 about a fatal fire in a Tennessee group home, The Associated Press reported that the facility was operated by a Tennessee group called Footprints to Recovery. The story should have made clear that it is not affiliated with an organization based in Chicago that operates in four other states with a similar name, but a different website.
